mound_villages.description: CSV of mound villages with UTM coordinates.

casarabe_sites.description: CSV of Casarabe archaeological sites in UTM coordinates.

geoglyphs.description: Geoglyph sites in Amazon with latitude/longitude.

submit.description: User-submitted archaeological survey predictions via GPT deep research.

science_data.description: Science dataset of archaeological sites with lat/lon.

coords_prepared.description: Points collected via GPT deep-research query for archaeological objects in target countries.

hydrorivers.description: Global river hydrography and network routing dataset.
hydrorivers.citation: Lehner, B., Grill G. (2013). Hydrological Processes, 27(15):2171–2186.

lidar_amazon.description: LiDAR surveys over selected Amazon sites (2008–2018), processed into 1m DTMs.
lidar_amazon.citation: NASA ORNL DAAC (2013). Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) Global.

embeddings.description: Major-TOM Core S2L1C SSL4EO embeddings for Amazonia satellite imagery.

dem.description: SRTM DEM data for elevation. NASA Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM)(2013). Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) Global. Distributed by OpenTopography.

gedi-data.description: Exported from Google Drive to Kaggle as dataset. Code snippet to download the data is shared in notebook.
